inline addJsCallback(jsFunctionName : String, appMethod : Dynamic) : Bool

returns
true when the externalinterface is available, else false
Method will add a listener for javscript-method calls

inline callJsMethod(jsFunctionName : String, ?info : haxe.PosInfos) : Void

returns
Whatever the method returns
Method allows application to call a javascript method

inline goBack() : Void

Loads the previous URL in the history URL

inline goBackTo(pos : Int) : Void

parameters
Int represeting the relative position in the history list.
Loads a URL from the history list.

Loads the next URL in the history lsit
